intro: I would love to see a decentralized p2p internet. Decentralization is the future of all things.

post.body: wow! zeronet looks like it is really starting to develop. A social network is exactly what we need. This could be the answer to big tech censorship.
I think that we have to get the word out about this social network. This could help zeronet to take off!
every single website that has been kicked off of their web hosting platform should create a site on zeronet

comment.body: i think the creators of the code should pull their license just to make a point, but they wont
